CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 16, 1961, pg. A3 reads: " 'New Era' Dawns at Herron Hill Junior High -Language Arts - On the language arts teaching team are, left to right: Mrs. Mary DiStasi, Mrs. Ruth Ritchey, team leader; Mrs. Ruby Nace LaLan Hurst, and Mrs. Alberta Williams."
TitMainTitle: Five Herron Hill Junior High School teachers, left to right: Ruth Ritchey, unknown woman, Alberta Williams, Mary DiStasi, and Ruby Nace LaLan Hurst, seated in semicircle in classroom
